posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
I've been working on a true Tank that doesn't just soak up damage, but is able to do some very nice things too. This guy has Epic Dodge, Can dual-wield, can have very High AC (shield possible if needed), Defensive Stance and Awareness and DR of 18/-. The AB is somewhat on the low side, but still not the worst one you'll find. It's very playable, can set epic traps, disable and recover all traps. In epics, he starts investing in Stealth, as in pre-epics he's mostly a Fighter DD with some Rogue on the side. There is also a non-EDR alternative that just focuses on DEX and uses Defensive Stance to tank after initially sneaking the casters out of their life.

Which one do you guys prefer?
